mapper.insert:
insert into ANIMAL(ANIMAL_ID,ANIMAL_NAME,ANIMAL_BIRTHDAY,ANIMAL_GENDER,ANIMAL_FEATURE) values(ANIMAL_ID_SEQ.nextval,#{animalName},#{animalBirthday},#{animalGender},#{animalFeature})
select ANIMAL_ID_SEQ.currval FROM dual
mapper.select: select a.ANIMAL_ID ANIMAL_ID ,a.ANIMAL_NAME ANIMAL_NAME ,a.ANIMAL_BIRTHDAY ANIMAL_BIRTHDAY ,a.ANIMAL_GENDER ANIMAL_GENDER,a.ANIMAL_FEATURE ANIMAL_FEATURE from animal a,member m ,raise r where a.ANIMAL_ID=r.ANIMAL_ID and m.MEMBER_ID=r.MEMBER_ID and m.MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}
